Package org.springdata.cql.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdminCqlOperations
    Operations for managing a Cassandra keyspace.
    CallbackHandler<T>
    Callback handler is used in asynchronous communication to transfer Result object
    CqlOperations
    Operations for interacting with Cassandra at the lowest level.
    FallbackHandler
    Fallback handler is used in asynchronous communication to transfer Error state
    HostMapper<T>
    Map host to type T
    IngestOperation
    Base interface that describes methods that can be used for Cassandra ingest operation.
    PreparedStatementBinder
    Prepared Statement Binder interface
    PreparedStatementCallback<T>
    Prepared Statement Callback interface
    PreparedStatementCreator
    Creates a PreparedStatement for the usage with the DataStax Java Driver
    ProcessOperation<T>
    Operation that processes ResultSet after select operation
    QueryCreator
    Base interface to create query
    QueryOperation<T,O extends QueryOperation<T,O>>
    Cassandra Query Operation
    ResultSetExtractor<T>
    ResultSet data extractor
    RowCallbackHandler
    Row Callback Handler interface
    RowMapper<T>
    RowMapper interface
    SchemaCqlOperations
    Cassandra Schema Operations interface TODO: Add createTable, alterTable, dropIndex methods
    SelectOneOperation
    SelectOneOperation is used for single result.
    SelectOperation
    General class for select operations.
    SessionCallback<T>
    Interface for operations on a Cassandra Session.
    UpdateOperation
    Base interface that describes methods that can be used for Cassandra update operation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractQueryOperation<T,O extends QueryOperation<T,O>>  
    AbstractSelectOneOperation
    Abstract implementation for SelectOneOperation
    AbstractUpdateOperation<O extends QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,O>>  
    CassandraFuture<T>
    CassandraFuture Used to map unchecked exceptions and support additional methods
    ClusteringCqlColumn
    ClusteringCqlColumn is used in createTable operation
    ConsistencyLevelResolver
    Determine driver consistency level based on ConsistencyLevel
    CqlColumn
    CqlColumn is used in createTable operation
    CqlTemplate
    This is the Central class in the Cassandra core package. It simplifies the use of Cassandra and helps to avoid common errors.
    DefaultAdminCqlOperations
    Default implementation of AdminCqlOperations.
    DefaultIngestOperation
    Default Ingest operation implementation
    DefaultSchemaCqlOperations
    Default Table Operations implementation
    DefaultSelectOperation
    Default implementation for SelectOperation
    DefaultUpdateOperation
    Default update operation implementation
    RetryPolicyResolver
    Determine driver query retry policy
    RingMember  
    RingMemberHostMapper
    Host to ring member translator
    RowMapperResultSetExtractor<T>
    ResutSetExtractor that uses RowMapper to extract data
    SimplePreparedStatementCreator  
    SimplePreparedStatementQueryCreator
    Prepared Statement Query Creator
    SimpleQueryCreator
    Simple query creator
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConsistencyLevel
    Generic Consistency Levels associated with Cassandra.
    KeyPart
    Values representing primary key parts.
    Ordering
    Enum for Cassandra primary key column ordering for clustering parts.
    RetryPolicy
    Retry Policies associated with Cassandra.
